meanings.definition: relating to or consisting of tissue
meanings.sent1: The tissular examination showed the tissue was healthy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the tissular composition of the skin.
meanings.sent3: The tissular bandage looked like a tiny quilt for the wound.
meanings.sent4: Her tissular knowledge was woven into every medical decision.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the tissular details of the cell structure.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the structure or organization of tissues
meanings.sent1: The tissular changes in the muscle were visible on the scan.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the tissular arrangement of organs.
meanings.sent3: The tissular puzzle of the body's design fascinated the students.
meanings.sent4: His tissular approach to problem-solving was methodical and precise.
meanings.sent5: The tissular patterns in nature mirrored those in the human body.
